question: The pound note was withdrawn from circulation. Birth of Prince Harry. Torville and Dean won Olympic gold.
The final Harry Potter book was released. The SNP became the largest party in the Scottish Parliament. Gordon Brown became Prime Minister
Edmond Hillary and Sherpa Tenzing reached the summit of Mount Everest. Queen Elizabeth II was crowned in Westminster Abbey.
Wearing front seat belts became UK law. The Queen Mother died aged 101. Will Young won the ITV talent contest, Pop Idol.
Maradonna’s Hand of God goal in the World Cup. The Chernobyl nuclear reactor exploded. Halley’s Comet came into view for the first time since 1910.
Lord Lucan disappeared. Red Rum won the Grand National. Richard Nixon announced his resignation as President of the USA.
Food rationing in Britain ended. The first successful human organ transplant took place. The football World Cup took place in Switzerland.
Supporters of Donald Trump attack the US Capitol Building. 12 clubs agree to join a new breakaway super league. The summer Olympics were held in Tokyo.
Greggs launched a meat free sausage roll. Thousands of protesters marched in London demanding a second referendum on leaving the EU. Bob Willis died.
Margaret Thatcher died. Manchester United win their 13th Premier League title and Alex Ferguson announces his retirement. Andy Murray wins the Men’s Singles at Wimbledon.
